posts.post_content:
This card was lovingly hung on a kid's wall in 1910 because he liked it so much that he wanted to see it every day. Now if that damage doesn't add some character and history to this card I don't know what does!!

Seriously though ... $OLD shipped to the lower 48 (I will ship elsewhere for additional $). Paypal FF.

Please use Net54 to send me an email (I don't like PMs).

Thanks for looking.
